MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the EH12 postcode area of Edinburgh. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6:41am. Our engineers have arrived onsite and are investigating the cause of the fault and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10am. e will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:26am on 23rd April.
